title: /x) Id this stretched serif please - Times {self (Nicola), Christian L}
content:
Hi there, I need to identify the font used in the "Magnifico" word (it's a label used in a ham). And what about "Cuor di prosciutto"? Could it be Times?

Thanks in advance.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100226141519im_/http:/typophile.com/files/magnifico_4054.jpg)
author: ncaleffi

comments.content: Your guess is as good as mine. Times bold distorted with bevel/emboss and some strokes
